short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage, add, and inject cookies into active browser tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Cookie Manager is a powerful and intuitive browser extension designed to simplify the management of cookies in your active browser tabs. Itâ€™s the perfect tool for developers, testers, and technical users who need quick and efficient cookie control.

Key Features
Add Cookies: Easily add cookies by inputting the key and value directly into the user-friendly interface.
Manage Cookies: View a list of saved cookies with options to inject or remove them individually.
Inject Cookies Dynamically: Inject cookies into any active web page with a single click.
Inject All Cookies: Inject all saved cookies simultaneously, making testing and web simulations effortless.
Local Storage: Saved cookies are securely stored locally in your browser and persist across sessions.
Modern & Accessible Interface: Designed with simplicity, accessibility (ARIA support), and keyboard navigation in mind.
Benefits
Efficiency: Inject cookies into web pages without needing browser developer tools.
Simplicity: Intuitive and clean interface, perfect for both beginners and professionals.
Productivity: A must-have tool for developers to test web sessions, simulate user interactions, and manage cookies.
Persistence: Your cookies are saved locally, making them reusable for future sessions.
Use Cases
Developers: Simulate user sessions, manage test environments, and debug authentication flows easily.
QA Testers: Streamline testing processes by quickly injecting cookies for various scenarios.
Technical Users: Customize and manage your browsing experience by manipulating cookies effortlessly.
About the Developer
This project is created and maintained by Arthur Hoch. If you enjoy using the Cookie Manager and would like to support ongoing development, consider buying me a coffee at Buy Me a Coffee (buymeacoffee.com/arthurhoch). â˜•
